name: Amazon
hint: Largest river by volume in the world, flowing through the world's largest rainforest

name: Parana
hint: Second-longest river in South America, forms part of the Argentina-Paraguay border

name: Orinoco
hint: Major river of Venezuela, one of the longest in South America

name: Sao Francisco
hint: Longest river entirely within Brazil, vital water source for the northeast

name: Magdalena
hint: Principal river of Colombia, flowing north to the Caribbean Sea

name: Uruguay River
hint: River forming the Argentina-Uruguay border, flowing into the Rio de la Plata

name: Tocantins
hint: Major river in central-eastern Brazil, flows into the Amazon estuary

name: Paraguay River
hint: Major tributary of the Parana, flowing through the Pantanal wetlands

name: Putumayo
hint: Amazon tributary forming part of the Colombia-Peru border

name: Rio Negro
hint: Largest blackwater river in the world, major left tributary of the Amazon

name: Madeira River
hint: Largest tributary of the Amazon by volume, flowing from Bolivia through Brazil

name: Rio de la Plata
hint: Widest river estuary in the world, between Argentina and Uruguay

name: Cauca River
hint: Second most important river in Colombia, running parallel to the Magdalena between two Andean ranges

name: Xingu River
hint: Major Amazon tributary in Brazil, home to indigenous peoples and the Belo Monte dam

name: Tapajos River
hint: Clearwater Amazon tributary in Brazil known for its turquoise waters and sandy beaches

name: Essequibo River
hint: Longest river in Guyana, flowing north through dense rainforest to the Atlantic

name: Bio-Bio River
hint: Major river in central-south Chile, historically the frontier of Mapuche territory

name: Pilcomayo River
hint: River forming part of the Argentina-Paraguay border, tributary of the Paraguay River

name: Ucayali River
hint: Major headwater of the Amazon in Peru, considered by some as the true Amazon source

name: Maroni River
hint: River forming the border between French Guiana and Suriname, flowing to the Atlantic
